examples: They visited a bar noted for its wide range of cocktails .

definitions.definition: A mixture of other substances or things.
examples: Scientists found a cocktail of pollutants in the river downstream from the chemical factory.

definitions.definition: A horse , not of pure breed, but having only one eighth or one sixteenth impure blood in its veins.
A species of rove beetle , so called from its habit of elevating the tail .

secondary_definitions: ( by extension ) A mixture of other substances or things.
A horse , not of pure breed, but having only one eighth or one sixteenth impure blood in its veins.
( UK , slang , dated ) A mean , half-hearted fellow .
A species of rove beetle , so called from its habit of elevating the tail .
